org.pmedv.pojos
Class Gallery

java.lang.Object
  org.pmedv.pojos.Gallery
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Gallery>
public class Gallery
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Gallery>

The gallery object is used to build up an html picture gallery.

Currently there's no web front end for the gallery, thus in order to build galleries, the AndamioManager is needed. Every gallery contains a SortedSet of Image objects.

Author:
Matthias Pueski
See Also:
XGalleryPlugin}, Image}, GalleryEnumUserType}, GalleryService}
